changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "subscription_payment" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "currency" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "amount_cents" INT NOT NULL, "stripe_payment_intent_key" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "failure_code" VARCHAR(100) NULL, "failure_message" TEXT NULL, "processed_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "subscription_invoice_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("subscription_invoice_id") REFERENCES "subscription_invoice" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("subscription_invoice_id", "stripe_payment_intent_key") );
